attributes.action: Reopen swimming pools and Gyms in tier 4 areas
attributes.background: To reopen Gyms and pools in tier 4 areas. To stop the estimated (200) pools/ leisure centers going under.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Allow swimming pools to remain open during Covid-19 in all alert levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554540
